raspers Little Book was a book of musings on chronicling adventures and their stories written by Arasper Ardanneth, the Sage of the Road and published in 1357 DR.
Araspers Little Book was collection of thoughts and musings making case for the need to recording not only histories of countries and kings but also daring adventures. It talked about how many adventures started with misfortune and hardship and those humble beginnings were not well preserved in record.
